content: Hello World Here are someways to embed Plotly images

Json Json works with some short-codes. However the slider is not working. Plotly.d3.json("/plotly/test.json", function(err, fig) { Plotly.plot('\/plotly\/test.json', fig.data, fig.layout, {responsive: true}); });

Html The html version of plotly is exported with CDN. The slider works! However, when the plot is too big it sometimes refused to show up. First try: (With slider) window.PlotlyConfig = {MathJaxConfig: 'local'}; window.PLOTLYENV=window.PLOTLYENV || {}; if (document.getElementById("9de01ca9-8031-45df-b636-e8a79a22544b")) { Plotly.newPlot( '9de01ca9-8031-45df-b636-e8a79a22544b', [{"hoverlabel": {"namelength": 0}, "hovertemplate": "%{hovertext}

Iframe Loading large plots with heavy data works with iframe Not sure which is better: hold plots on Plot.ly, Netlify, or Github --

Tableau plots Here we used Tableau Public var divElement = document.getElementById('viz1620689576250'); var vizElement = divElement.getElementsByTagName('object')[0]; vizElement.style.width='100%';vizElement.style.height=(divElement.offsetWidth*0.75)+'px'; var scriptElement = document.createElement('script'); scriptElement.src = 'https://public.tableau.com/javascripts/api/viz_v1.js'; vizElement.parentNode.insertBefore(scriptElement, vizElement); --
